title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2403.8 - Representation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2403.8 - Representation

State Regulations

Any person compelled to appear in person or who voluntarily
appears before the corporation shall be accorded the right to be accompanied, represented and advised by counsel. In a proceeding before the corporation, every party or person shall be accorded the right to appear in person or by or
with counsel. Nothing in this section shall be construed either to grant or to
deny to any person who is not a lawyer the right to appear for or represent
others before the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2403.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
